'Cis' () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina ÅwiÄtajno, within
Szczytno County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately south of ÅwiÄtajno, east of Szczytno,

Before 1945 the area was part of Germany (East Prussia).
